original: bka' stsal pa /

original: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: bka' stsal pa /

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Good son,

original: rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: de de lta'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /

analyzed: de skad ma zer cig / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: ” The Buddha said, “Good son, do not say that.

analyzed: ci'i slad du lags / bka' stsal pa / rigs kyi bu /

analyzed: de dag tu'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mthong ba'i tshul gyis lta ste /
translated: And in those buddhafields, they see the lord buddhas in a manner that is free from seeing.

original: ji @401a *// ltar sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas rnams gzigs pa de ltar lta bar 'os pas des na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ji @401a *// ltar sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas rnams gzigs pa de ltar lta bar 'os pas des na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: It is fitting that one should see the buddhas in the same way that the buddhas see the buddhas. Therefore, one is called an arhat.

original: 'di lta bu'i zhing bsgrub par 'os te /
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i zhing bsgrub par 'os te /
translated: It is fitting that one should accomplish a realm such as this:

original: chos thams cad 'grub pa med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zhing dang / sgrib pa med pa'i zhing dang / bdud bcom pa'i zhing dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i zhing dang / spros pa med pa'i zhing dang rnyog pa med pa'i zhing dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'grub pa med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zhing dang / sgrib pa med pa'i zhing dang / bdud bcom pa'i zhing dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i zhing dang / spros pa med pa'i zhing dang rnyog pa med pa'i zhing dang /
translated: a realm that is inconceivable in the sense that all phenomena are unaccomplished, a realm that is free of obscurations, a realm in which the māras have been destroyed, a realm that is equal to the unequalled, a realm that is free of elaboration and free of turbidity,

original: stong pa'i zhing dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i zhing dang / bud med med pa'i zhing dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa'i zhing dang / phyir rgol ba med pa'i zhing dang / shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhing dang /
analyzed: stong pa'i zhing dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i zhing dang / bud med med pa'i zhing dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i zhing dang / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa'i zhing dang / phyir rgol ba med pa'i zhing dang / shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i zhing dang /
translated: a realm that is empty, a realm that is irreversible, a realm that is free of women, a realm that is free of afflictions, a realm of the eloquence of the buddhas, a realm that is free of opposition, a realm of complete nirvāṇa,

original: de lta bu'i zhing bsgrub par 'os pas des na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i zhing bsgrub par 'os pas des na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Since such a field is worthy of being accomplished, it is called an arhat.

original: chags par 'gyur ba rnams la'ang mi chags shing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba rnams la'ang 'khrugs pa med de /
analyzed: chags par 'gyur ba rnams la'ang mi chags shing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba rnams la'ang 'khrugs pa med de /
translated: They are not attached to what is worthy of attachment, nor are they disturbed by what is worthy of disturbance.

original: des na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: des na dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is called arhat.

original: des 'gog pa dang mnyam pa'i theg pa de shes shing /
analyzed: des 'gog pa dang mnyam pa'i theg pa de shes shing /
translated: They know that vehicle which is equal to cessation.

original: des sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rtogs la /
analyzed: des sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rtogs la /
translated: By that, they realize the Buddha vehicle.

original: des rab tu phye ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub de rab tu dbye bar 'os so //
analyzed: des rab tu phye ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub de rab tu dbye bar 'os so //
translated: The enlightenment of the Blessed Buddhas, which is revealed by that, is worthy of being distinguished.

original: sems can g-yo ba med pas byang chub de bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
analyzed: sems can g-yo ba med pas byang chub de bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
translated: Since beings are unmoving, that enlightenment is inconceivable.

original: g-yo ba med par bya ba'i phyir sems can bye ba phrag mang po byang chub la 'god par 'os so //
analyzed: g-yo ba med par bya ba'i phyir sems can bye ba phrag mang po byang chub la 'god par 'os so //
translated: In order to make them unmoving, it is worthy to establish many millions of beings in enlightenment.

original: mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad @401b dang / byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa rnams la ni sems can thams cad @401b dang / byang chub kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: For those who abide in equality, all beings and enlightenment are nonconceptual.

original: mnyam pa nyid la sems can rnams mngon du 'dzud par 'os so //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid la sems can rnams mngon du 'dzud par 'os so //
translated: It is fitting to introduce sentient beings to sameness.

original: ji ltar mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid med pa ltar chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: ji ltar mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid med pa ltar chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo //
translated: Just as sameness is not in sameness, so all phenomena are the same.

original: mnyam pa nyid ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin te /
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin te /
translated: Just as sameness is, so is awakening.

original: rnam par mi rtog pa mnyam par gnas pa yin la dgra bcom pa'ang de dang mnyam mo //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa mnyam par gnas pa yin la dgra bcom pa'ang de dang mnyam mo //
translated: It is the same as the nonconceptual state of resting, and it is the same as the worthy ones.

original: 'di ltar yang 'os te /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang 'os te /
translated: It is also fitting that

original: de ltar shes nas kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'os so //
analyzed: de ltar shes nas kyang de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'os so //
translated: having understood thus, one should teach the Dharma to sentient beings in that way.

original: chos gang la'ang 'dre bar mi byed de /
analyzed: chos gang la'ang 'dre bar mi byed de /
translated: One should not mix with any Dharma.

original: 'dre ba med par bstan pa'i chos dang ldan zhing de ltar chos ston pa dang / tshig tu'ang mi brjod par 'os so //
analyzed: 'dre ba med par bstan pa'i chos dang ldan zhing de ltar chos ston pa dang / tshig tu'ang mi brjod par 'os so //
translated: It is fitting to teach the Dharma of nonmixing, and to teach the Dharma in that way, and not to speak of it in words.

original: sems can du dmigs par 'du shes pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can rtag pa dang / chad pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can 'jig tshogs la lta ba las bskyod pa dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal las shin tu bzla ba dang /
analyzed: sems can du dmigs par 'du shes pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can rtag pa dang / chad pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can 'jig tshogs la lta ba las bskyod pa dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal las shin tu bzla ba dang /
translated: to liberate them from the eternalism and nihilism of sentient beings, to liberate them from the view of the transitory collection of sentient beings, to liberate them from the pride of thinking “I am,”

original: chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa las dgrol ba dang / gzugs rnam par mi 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang /

translated: to liberate them from the non-arising, non-ceasing, and non-conditioning of all phenomena, to liberate them from the fear of form, to liberate them from the fear of feeling, perception, formation,

original: rnam par shes pa rnam par mi 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos g-yo ba med pa las dgrol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi 'jog pa dang / rab tu bkod pa las dgrol ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bur 'du shes pa las dgrol ba dang /
